<comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <control_definition>The organization plans and coordinates security-related activities affecting the information system with affected internal or external stakeholders, groups, or organizations before conducting such activities to reduce the impact on other organizational entities.</control_definition> <control_family display_value="Planning">4687f9fcdb211010280df36f299619f4</control_family> <control_name>Plan/Coordinate with Other Organizational Entities</control_name> <control_number>PL-02(03)</control_number> Baseline</reference_policy> <rejection_goto/> <related_controls>CP-4, IR-4</related_controls> <service_offering/> <short_description/> <sla_due/> <standard>NIST-800</standard> <state>1</state> <supplemental_guidance>These stakeholders, groups, or organizations could include those involved with security-related activities, or providing services or support (such as [TIC] or those involved in COOP planning).Security-related activities include, for example, security assessments, audits, hardware and software maintenance, patch management, and contingency plan testing. Planning and coordination includes emergency and nonemergency (i.e., planned or non-urgent unplanned) situations. The process defined by organizations to plan and coordinate security-related activities can be included in security plans for information systems or other documents, as appropriate.</supplemental_guidance> <sys_class_name>x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-19 13:21:28</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>!!!/!!!/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0e873dfcdb211010280df36f29961905</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-19 13:21:28</sys_updated_on> <task_for/> <time_worked/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1> </record_update>
